title: Search Advertising Advertisement
description: Search Advertising Advertisement describes a single text Advertisement.

searchads:advertisementId.title: Advertisement Identifier
searchads:advertisementId.description: Advertisement Id on the search advertising platform.

searchads:searchEngineId.title: Search Engine Identifier
searchads:searchEngineId.description: The application-specified identifier used to identify the Search Advertising Platform Name.

searchads:internalAdgroupId.title: Internal Ad Group Identifier
searchads:internalAdgroupId.description: Internal Ad Group Id for the Advertisement. This identifier determines uniqueness of the Ad Group and Advertisement record.

searchads:advertisementStatus.title: Advertisement Status
searchads:advertisementStatus.description: Advertisement Status indicates if underlying ads are eligible to serve.

searchads:title1.title: Advertisement Title Field 1
searchads:title1.description: The first portion of the headline for a text advertisement

searchads:title2.title: Advertisement Title Field 2
searchads:title2.description: The second portion of the headline for a text advertisement

searchads:title3.title: Advertisement Title Field 3
searchads:title3.description: The third portion of the headline for a text advertisement

searchads:description1.title: Advertisement Description Field 1
searchads:description1.description: The first portion of the Advertisement Description Field

searchads:description2.title: Advertisement Description Field 2
searchads:description2.description: The second portion of the Advertisement Description Field

searchads:displayUrl.title: Advertisement Display URL
searchads:displayUrl.description: The web url that is shown in the Advertisement

searchads:displayPath1.title: Advertisement Display Path 1
searchads:displayPath1.description: The first path in the Advertisement url that lets customers know where the Advertisment will direct them

searchads:displayPath2.title: Advertisement Display Path 2
searchads:displayPath2.description: The second path in the Advertisement url that lets customers know where the Advertisement will direct them

searchads:createDate.description: The date and time when the Advertisment was created. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

searchads:modifyDate.description: The date and time when the Advertisement was last modified. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".
